creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
using the new compile-xsp target, i found a couple XSP problems in trunk. some
of them might be bogus due to classpath issues, but some definitely look genuine
and need to be fixed.

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 13781
Ant log file from running compile-xsp

text:

Ant log file from running compile-xsp for Lenya 1.2

And here is the same list for Lenya 1.2. There seems to be a problem with the
LuceneCocoonIndexer:

LuceneCocoonIndexer cannot be resolved (or is not a valid type) for the field
create_index_xsp.lcii

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: these have been fixed ecxept for the static access bug which is covered in 33225
